code: import axios from"axios";var API_URL="http://localhost:8080/api/auth/";var register=function register(email,mobile,password,roles){console.log(roles);return axios.post(API_URL+"signup",{email:email,mobile:mobile,password:password,roles:roles});};var login=function login(email,password){return axios.post(API_URL+"signin",{email:email,password:password}).then(function(response){if(response.data.accessToken){localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(response.data));}return response.data;});};var logout=function logout(){localStorage.removeItem("user");};export default{register:register,login:login,logout:logout};
